name: Keyboard Cat
one_liner: A video of a cat named Fatso 'playing' an upbeat tune on an electronic keyboard.
meaning: Used as a 'play off' for failures or embarrassing moments (Play him off, Keyboard Cat!).
remix_rules: Edit onto the end of fail videos
example_lines: You fell on your face, play him off with the keys
Old school like the cat in the blue shirt
